name: Red Lobster® Biscuits (Gluten Free)
author: RonnieCanCook!
summary: This is one of my favorite recipes and it's gluten free!
ingredients: 2 cups gluten-free all purpose baking flour
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Whisk flour, baking powder, salt, 1 teaspoon parsley, onion powder, and 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder together in a bowl
Add milk and vegetable oil; stir until smooth
Mix in Cheddar cheese until dough is combined
Roll dough into 2-inch balls and place 2-inches apart on prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes
Stir 1/4 cup parsley, melted butter, and 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder together in a bowl
Brush butter mixture onto hot biscuits; let biscuits cool 10 to 15 minutes
